description:
Do you love your pets?  Then My Pets is the perfect app for you!  My Pets lets anyone with a pet keep track of essential information! My Pets features an attractive, simple user interface that will help you remember and conveniently share that vital info for your furry family member! 

EVENT TRACKING: 
Keep track of medical history, as well as other vital info, including: 
*vet visit history 
*vaccinations/shots record history with titers 
*medication history (flea meds, etc) 
*reminders for your dog’s monthly heartworm meds 
*plan & track your horse's detailed deworming schedule 
*grooming history 
*a journal type area for writing down memories and/or training sessions 

INFORMATION SHARING: 
* Going out of town?  Forget about leaving long lists of instructions for your pet's babysitter!  With My Pets, you can send an email with all your pet's care information at the touch of a button!  

AGE CALCULATOR 
* Wonder how old your pet really is?  Did you know that determining the age of your dog or cat is not just a matter of multiplying by 7?  There is actually a scientific formula that reflects the fact that your pet goes from newborn to adult in a year or less, & ages differently as a senior as well. My Pets uses this advanced formula to tell you your dog or cat's age in human years!  

PETS INCLUDE:
*dogs 
*cats 
*fish 
*birds 
*rabbits 
*turtles 
*hamsters 
*ferrets 
*hedgehogs 
*horses 

UPDATE 1.1.9: 
* pet color, markings
* vet name, address
* various bug fixes throughout 

We’re constantly trying to improve the app!  Let us know what features you’d like to see on our feedback forum at lukewalkerapps.com, then follow us on Twitter & Facebook to know as soon as an update is on the way!  Get support by emailing support@lukewalkerapps.com.
